Question 79) To those who are not enough, nothing is enough.
Epicurus. The thinkers. São Paulo: April Cultural, 1985.
Remnant of the Hellenistic period, the maximum presented values ​​the following virtue:
A) Hope, regarded as confidence in the future.
B) Justice, interpreted as righteousness of character.
C) Temperance, marked by the domain of will.
D) courage, defined as fortitude in difficulty.
E) prudence, characterized by the correct use of reason.
